data.title: Oak Brook School – Private School & Early Learning
data.text:
Helping Kids Grow

Providing a better learning environment for children in Murphy, TX

About Us

Oak Brook School opened in 2001 and has been a leading child care provider in the Murphy, TX area. We have been voted BEST EARLY EDUCATION, BEST CHILD CARE, BEST PRIVATE SCHOOL and BEST SUMMER CAMP in Murphy/Wylie/N. Richardson by Living magazine’s Readers’ Choice every year since 2016.

Oak Brook School is a Texas Rising Star certified preschool which ensures we maintain a high quality of care and education. Great teachers that wish to join us are welcome to apply here.

Our goal has always been to offer the best early education program to our community and we strive to do that each day at all three locations.

Why Choose Oak Brook School?

When choosing a child care center, parents want to know that they are making the right choice. What should parents look and ask for in a high quality childcare center? At Oak Brook School, we aim to provide a clean, safe, and nurturing, fun-filled environment for learning. We want our parents to feel comfortable leaving their children in our care as they go about their daily business.

Parents Should Ask Every Preschool…

Is A State Certified Curriculum Used?

OBS uses Frog Street Curriculum

Is The School State Certified?

OBS is TEXAS Rising Star Certified

Are Meals Freshly Prepared or Frozen Pre-Made Heat and Serve?

OBS serves Chef Prepared Nutritious Meals

What Safety Precautions Exist?

OBS has Controlled Access Building

OBS has Camera System Recording

OBS has Daily Janitorial Cleaning

OBS has COVID Protocols In Place

Years of Experience

Qualified Teachers

% Committed to Excellence

Extra-Curricular Activities

Our Programs

6 weeks – 12 Years

We offer several age-appropriate programs to best suit your child’s developmental and academic needs.

We follow a teacher-driven curriculum until the Early Learners classroom. Our Preschool, Pre-K and Kindergarten Jumpstart students follow the state-approved Frog Street and Harcourt curriculums.

Infants & Tots

(6 weeks – 2 years)

Little Tykes

(2 years – 3 years)

Early Learners

(3 – 4 years)

Pre-Kindergarten

(4 -4.5 years)

Kindergarten Jumpstart

(4.5 – 5 years)

After School and Summer Camp

(5 – 12 years)

Your Peace Of Mind

Oak Brook School is located on a 2.6 acre lot with large classrooms and three age-appropriate separate playground areas.

We consider our family-friendly culture, our facility, our teachers and management team, our curriculum, real time communication with parents and the fresh food we serve as our key pillars of strength.

Our Gallery

We Proudly Use ProCare Software.

ProCare helps us to build stronger connections with our families and helps involve parents in their child’s day-to-day activities.

Parents can receive live updates from teachers for easy, two-way communication throughout the day. Teachers can also share daily activities, videos, photos and newsletters keeping parents informed and connected.

What Our Parents Are Saying

5 star rating

This school has been a God send! The teachers and staff are amazing. The school is the perfect starting place for our daughter. Everyone knows all the kids names. They treat all the parents and kids so well. They have amazing events for the kids and the families and the extra curricular activities they offer are awesome. My daughter never wants to leave each day! So glad we found Oak Brook.

Mariana Lenox

Parent

5 star rating

5 star rating

5 star rating

I recently moved from Detroit and was worried about my 2.5 and 4.5 yr old daughters adjusting to both parents working. OBS has been a lifesaver. The transition was made easy because when the girls first get dropped off they stay together till it’s time to break apart. This decreased the anxiety of both girls. They both love going to school and it’s more of a struggle to get them to want to go home. As a parent I couldn’t ask for more caring staff and teachers. Would recommend OBS to everyone

Daisy Dominguez Mills

Parent

So thankful for the teachers and staff at this school! My daughter is learning so much! The environment is friendly which I love, and the teachers are always keeping me up to date with how my baby is doing! Hands up, best school ever, it’s nerve wrecking being a first time mommy, but so far, Oak Brook is making this a much smoother experience!

Lovina Lopez

Parent

Come Be A Part of the Oak Brook School Family. Enroll Today!
